description: Cross-session error tracking for pattern detection and knowledge base updates

signature.pattern: Nested git clone found in working directory

occurrences.message: Found TogetherOS/ directory inside TogetherOS repo - a nested clone
occurrences.context: Session start - checking git status showed untracked TogetherOS/ directory

signature.pattern: git stash does not include untracked files by default

resolved_patterns.resolution: Added 'Stashing with Untracked Files' section to ci-cd-discipline.md. Solution: Always use `git stash push -u` to include untracked files.

signature.pattern: Started work on wrong branch, had to switch mid-session

resolved_patterns.resolution: Added 'Pre-Work Branch Verification (MANDATORY)' section to ci-cd-discipline.md. Solution: Always run `git branch --show-current` and `git status` before starting work.
